quests.title: Plant a Native Sapling
quests.summary: Plant a native sapling in your school garden or local park and document the process
quests.instructions: Find a suitable location, dig a hole twice the width of the root ball, plant the sapling, water it, and take before/after photos showing your work.
quests.safetyNotes: Wear gloves and ask for adult supervision when using tools

quests.title: Zero Waste Lunch Challenge
quests.summary: Pack and eat a completely zero-waste lunch for one week
quests.instructions: Use reusable containers, avoid single-use packaging, compost organic waste, and document your daily lunch setup.
quests.safetyNotes: Ensure all food is properly stored and fresh

quests.title: Energy Audit Detective
quests.summary: Conduct an energy audit of your classroom and identify 5 ways to save energy
quests.instructions: Check lighting, electronics, heating/cooling, and windows. Document current state and propose improvements with photos and notes.
quests.safetyNotes: Do not touch electrical equipment, only observe and document

quests.title: Water Conservation Hero
quests.summary: Install water-saving devices and track your family's water usage for a week
quests.instructions: Install low-flow showerheads or faucet aerators, track daily water usage, and calculate savings achieved.
quests.safetyNotes: Ask an adult to help with any installations

quests.title: Bike to School Week
quests.summary: Use sustainable transport (bike, walk, or public transport) for a full school week
quests.instructions: Document your daily journey to school using eco-friendly transport. Track distance, time, and carbon savings compared to car travel.
quests.safetyNotes: Always wear a helmet when cycling and follow traffic rules
